varieties

	
		
		Conventional:
			Minimum Down Payment: 5%
		
			https://www.forbes.com/advisor/mortgages/conventional-mortgage/
		
				
			3% first payment:
				# first payment
				
				if mortgage insurance
				
				
			20% first payment:
				if no mortgage insurance
				
				
			
			not gov backed
			
			
		


		FHA:
			Minimum Down Payment: 3.5%
		
			gov backed:
				insured by the Federal Housing Administration
		
		
		
		VA
			for veterans



		USDA:
			Minimum Down Payment: 0%

			gov backed:
				guaranteed by the department of agriculture
